subdisciplines.name: Afrofuturism
subdisciplines.description: A genre that combines elements of science fiction and fantasy with African-American cultural traditions

subdisciplines.name: Black Feminist Literature
subdisciplines.description: Literature that explores the intersection of race and gender in the experiences of black women

subdisciplines.name: Hip Hop Literature
subdisciplines.description: A subgenre of African American literature that uses the style, themes, and values of hip hop culture.
